results.content:
I think the course is a little pricey considering how short it is. I would have liked to see some more chrome extension specific information, other things chrome allows you to do.
It also requires an update for loading Jquery, I think that Google has updated their security when it comes to loading scripts.

Good though

response.content: Thank you Nathaniel Caird for the feedback. I really appreciate it.
response.content_html: Thank you Nathaniel Caird for the feedback. I really appreciate it.
